price: Hakika Sisi tumeiteremsha Qur'ani kwa Kiarabu ili mpate kuzingatia.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ قُرۡءَٰنًا عَرَبِيّٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
footnotes: Hakika Sisi tumemteremshia Mtume wetu haya maneno kwa lugha yenu ya Kiarabu yasomwe na yahifadhiwe, ili muyafahamu, na muwafikishie watu wote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā anzalnāhu qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan laʿallakum taʿqilūna
